subtitles.text: Thank you for watching!
Here you go! It's starting!
It's time for the "Halo"! This time I'm joined by Yume Kudo from Juice- Juice and Marin Fukuda from Tsubaki Factory.
This time, we'll be presenting you with these two, so please bear with us until the end.
Today, February 21, the day of distribution, is the release date of Tsubaki Factory's new album, 3rd Moment.
Congratulations!
For me, this is my first album since joining Tsubaki Factory,
I myself bought Tsubaki Factory's 1st Bloom and 2nd Step myself,
I myself bought Tsubaki Factory's 1st Bloom and 2nd Step on my own, so it's a strange feeling to have my voice on an album that I have such an emotional attachment to,
I am very happy to have my voice in such an album that I have such a strong attachment to.
Do you have a favorite song?
Well, I am very attached to the song "Power Flower," which is a new song on Disc 2 of the album,
This song is very powerful and has Tsubaki Factory's style in it,
Especially, there are many rap parts in this song, and the three of us are doing the rap parts,
There are many rap parts in this song, and I am very happy to be chosen as one of the three members to do the rap part,
I will do my best to make it cool.
I will do my best to make it cool. I'd like to do my best to be cool.
Yes, I have been working with the new members of Tsubaki Factory for a couple of times,
I have worked with the new members of Tsubaki Factory a couple of times, and I was impressed by how young all three of them are.
We are in the second and third year of junior high school, so our ages are quite far apart,
We are the same age, 19 years old.
Junior high school students, huh?
I think it's cute that they all seem to be having fun talking about school,
I think all three of us are very soft, yet have a core,
I am very happy to have these girls who are so typical of Tsubaki Factory,
For me, it's the first time to be a junior member, so I'm very anxious about it,
I'm very anxious about it, but if you have any advice on how to treat junior members, please let me know.
Well, I think there are a lot of things we don't know about each other,
I think there are a lot of things we don't know about each other, so I would like to communicate with them a lot first,
I really liked origami, so I thought I could play with it in my free time at work,
I had an origami set and asked them to play with it with me.
I would love to know if you have any hobbies or interests,
I'd love to hear about your hobbies and interests, but I'm interested in what you have to say.
I look forward to hearing from you.

Yume Yakami of Juice- Juice and Mari Fukuda of Tsubaki Factory present "Hello! STE.
From here on, we'll be talking about the Hello! Project Chotto No. 1!
Project Chokotto No.1! Project, we conducted a survey on a little bit of a theme.
We will announce who is the No.1 in a ranking format.
The theme this time is which member I want to be a big sister.
By the way, Mari, who do you think would be No.1?
I think Morning Musume。's Akemi Haga, who I voted for. I personally think it will be Akemi Haga of Morning Musume's 24, whom I voted for.
When I talk with her, I feel a sense of security, and she makes me feel very warm and fuzzy.
I think that's why she is in the ranking.
By the way, I voted for Shin Maeda of Beyonce,
Ms. Maeda has a very calm atmosphere, and she talks to me a lot, Tako-chan,
I voted for her because I have a personal wish that she would be my big sister.
Let's take a look at the ranking!
Let's take a look at the ranking!
The three members were in a tie, so I'll announce the names first.
The third member we would like to see as a big sister is Ayumi Ishida of Morning Musume。 24's Ayumi Ishida, who received 5 votes,
The third place went to Ayumi Ishida of Morning Musume。 24's Rena Yokoyama and Ayano Kawamura of Angulum.
The members who voted for Ms. Ishida are as follows,
She is kind, funny, and sincere, so I think it would be great if she were my sister.
Eishion Tamura said, "She is kind, funny, sincere, and I think it would be great if she were my big sister.
The other comment was from Ruru Tamura, who is caring, kind, strong, and cool.
That's right.
The comment for Yokoyama-san was from Homaru Okamura, who simply makes you feel like she is your big sister.
Honoka Kobayashi's comment to Ms. Kawamura was, "I want her to be like a friend, but a dependable big sister.
The comment for Ms. Kawamura came from Ms. Rena Yokoyama, who said that she admires Ms. Kawamura in many ways: she is firm but also very cute.
Shiori Yaguchi, who I think is very kind, versatile, and wonderful, and has a little bit of a gap between herself and her sister, who I think is very interesting.
Kawamura-san, I often go out with you, and you really are like an older sister.
Yes, she is.
I'm really like an older sister. Ste!
Next up, we have comments from the members who voted for the second place! I often feel like an older sister when I'm with her.
One commenter, Elisa, said that she would be happy if she were actually her big sister. She is kind and always pampers me, arranges my hair for me at concerts, and is very kind to me.
I had a hunch that it would be her, but I was surprised to find out that she was the one I wanted to be the big sister of the group.
The second member I would like to see as a big sister is Danbaralulu from Juice Chusu, who received 7 votes!

Yume Yakami of Juice- Juice and Marin Fukuda of Tsubaki Factory present "Halo! Sta.

We are going to introduce a little theme for all the members of the Hello! Project, we have conducted a survey on a small theme and announced who is the number one member of the project in the form of a ranking.

The theme of this year's survey was "Which member would you like to be your big sister? The third place was tied between Ayami Ishida, Rena Yokoyama, and Ayano Kawamura, and the second place went to Ruru Danbara.
The first question was, "Which member would you like to be your big sister? Who is the first place winner? Please watch the VTR. Please watch the VTR.
Yes, because she was the first person that came to mind when I was asked who I would like to be my big sister, and also because she is always kind to me and takes care of me.

Just by looking at her, I thought, "What a beautiful woman! How beautiful she is! If she were my sister, I would be so proud of her. There are so many things that I admire about her that I would want to be a member of her sisterhood.

First of all, my first impression of her was that she was very beautiful and radiated an overwhelming aura, so when I talked to her, I wondered if it was okay for me to talk to her or not. But when I talk to her, she gives me a fluffy impression, has a wonderful smile, and is a little bit out of the ordinary, which I think is really wonderful,
If she becomes my big sister, I will be proud of her for the rest of my life.
The member I would like to have as my big sister is Akari Uemura of Juice-Juice.
I am Akari Uemura of Juice-Juice.
You have chosen me as the No. 1 member you want to be your big sister.
Then, No.1!
So, I have the impression that I'm quite surprising.
I am an only child.
I have a strong yearning for older sisters, older brothers, younger sisters, and younger brothers.
So I was happy to hear you say that.
When I heard this, I thought to myself, "This is what being a big sister is all about.
I carry a blotting sheet with me.
When I carry a blotting sheet, the members who are not me
When I carry a stain-removing sheet, the members who are not me don't spill food on it.
or a pen got a little stain on it...

Mr. Kamimura, I'll give you a blotting sheet.
"I have some, I have some...
I always get calls saying, "Oh, you're always so helpful!
I always have a stain remover sheet and other things in my bag.
That's the secret of being a big sister.
But I still think that the ideal big sister is...
I'm drawn to older sisters, or older sisters.
That's what I'm drawn to.
My ideal older sister is someone who has a sense of intimacy with me.
I'd like to get closer to that ideal.
I think I'm pretty much like this at the moment.
The questionnaire made me sound like a fluffy older sister, so...
I'm not like that.
I'd like to be a leader who pulls people along.
She's not a leader, she's a big sister.
The leader is the leader of JuiceJuice.
I'm going to do my best to be a mature older sister.
Oh, I'm going to spill it again! It's almost gone!

She is in the same group as me, JuiceJuice,
She's a member of the same group as me, JuiceJuice, and she's very friendly and a very senior member of the group,
He told me that he brought this dress because he thought it would look good on Taco,

Hello! Project Chokonto No. 1, please look forward to the next issue.
Hello! Project Chokotte No.1, look forward to the next installment.
Yume Kudo of Juice- Juice and Marin Fukuda of Tsubaki Factory present "Halo! STE. It's time to say goodbye.
Here is an announcement.
Project 2024 Winter 3 of Us will be held in the middle of the year. Project 2024 Winter 3 of Us is now underway.
Juice- Juice is on Team B and Tsubaki Factory is on Team A. The only thing left is the Sapporo show the day after tomorrow.
This year's concert of Halo! Project concert, I hope you will enjoy the way the groups mix and mingle with each other.
Tsubaki Factory's new album, 3rd Moment, was released today.
This album includes new live songs, songs written especially for this album, and the graduation song sung by the graduating members on their last stage,
This album is filled with songs that only Tsubaki can produce, so please listen to it.
On April 10, Tsubaki Factory Concert Tour 2023 Autumn! Atara yo! Riko Yamagishi and Yume Kishimoto's graduation special Akatsuki video will be released.
Please be sure to get it to enjoy the very quiet, chic, and mature world of Tsubaki Factory.
On March 10, the 7th anniversary of Tsubaki Factory's major debut, Live Realize, will be held at the Ichikawa City Cultural Hall.
We are looking forward to seeing you all at the event, which we are sure will be a surprise to everyone who comes to the venue.
JuiceJuice Concert Tour 2024 Manline will start on April 20 at Harmony Hall Zama.

This will be the last spring tour since Akari Yumemaru is scheduled to graduate. This will be the last time we will tour with our current group, and I hope many people will be able to see JuiceJuice as it is now.
Let's have a lot of fun!
Tsubaki Factory Concert Tour 2024 Spring Come on!
This will be the last spring tour with 12 members, and I hope we can absorb a lot of things from Ms. Shinnuma and make this tour to grow up even more.
The Carmon Neutral 2024 by Satoyama Umi Movement will be held at Makuhari Messe on March 30 and 31.
I look forward to this event every year and hope that many people will come.
Hello! Ste is a channel where the members of Hello! Project will appear more and more.
New videos will be uploaded every Wednesday, so please subscribe to the channel.
This time we have Yume Kudo from JuiceJuice and Marin Fukuda from Tsubaki Factory.
Bye!
Thank you for watching!
